about_the_game:
This is a fascinating VR immersive submarine tour exploration game, which provides players with an unforgettable seabed shipbuilding and aircraft wreckage exploration experience.



In this exciting game, players will become a charming and courageous woman who will freely visit and shuttle in the mysterious and unknown underwater world. You will be shocked by the scenery in front of you. The 360 -degree panoramic picture makes you really be in the underwater kingdom, and a variety of fish swim around you. You can freely explore historical relics such as shipwrecks in the depths of the ocean and crashed planes, and each place is full of mystery and unknown.
When you sneak into the deep sea, you will find that the details of the shipwreck are amazing. You can carefully observe the structure of the ship, the history of navigation, and the traces of the years it experienced. In the wreckage of the crash, you can imagine the historical events and thrilling moments at the time, and feel the tension atmosphere of life and death.
In short, this is an intoxicating VR immersive submarine tour exploration game. By exploring historical relics such as the underwater shipbuilding and the wreckage of the aircraft, you will feel an immersive adventure experience.



Operation method:
Move Forward/Backward ： Left-handle up/down
Move Left/Right ： Left-handle left/right
Swim Up/Down : Right-handle up/down
Turn : Right-handle left/right
Quit : Menu key

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
